post.title: IDEA 2006
post.content: I saw from Bruce Sterling’s blog that he’s going to be at Idea 2006 next month in Seattle. Bruce is at or near the top of the list of “folks I’d like to chat with over a few good beers”. I saw him at ETech and have since read and thoroughly enjoyed both Shaping Things and Tomorrow Now. I wonder if I can make it to IDEA?
